references.paper_title: Robust recovery of subspace structures by low-rank representation
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of low-rank representation (LRR) for subspace clustering, a core technique that the current work builds upon and enhances.

references.paper_title: On unifying multi-view self-representations for clustering by tensor multi-rank minimization
references.reason: This work is highly influential as it pioneers the use of tensor-based methods for multi-view subspace clustering, a key approach that the current research extends.

references.paper_title: Logarithmic Schatten-p norm minimization for tensorial multi-view subspace clustering
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel tensor rank approximation method that directly inspires the current work's development of the hyperbolic tangent rank approximation.

references.paper_title: Multi-view spectral clustering tailored tensor low-rank representation
references.reason: This work is highly relevant due to its direct application of tensor-based methods to multi-view spectral clustering, a related technique whose strengths the current work aims to combine with its proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Human collective intelligence inspired multi-view representation learning - enabling view communication by simulating human communication mechanism
references.reason: This paper shares a similar focus on multi-view representation learning, addressing challenges in capturing high-order correlations and achieving consensus representations, making it highly relevant to the current study's goals.
